00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <sstream>
00022 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/property_tree/xml_parser.hpp>
00024 #include "network.hpp"
00025 #include "network/client/client_multi_base.hpp"
00026 #include "run.hpp"
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00031   try {
00032     vm = process_options("config/multi_downconvert.xml", argc, argv);
00033   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00034     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00035     return 1;
00036   }
00037 
00038   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00039   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00040   try {
00041     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00042     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config,
00043              boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00044 
00045     boost::asio::signal_set signals
00046       (network::get_io_service(), SIGINT, SIGTERM, SIGQUIT);
00047     signals.async_wait
00048       (boost::bind
00049        (&boost::asio::io_service::stop, boost::ref(network::get_io_service())));
00050 
00051     network::client::client_multi_base c(network::get_io_service(), config);
00052     c.start();
00053 
00054     boost::thread_group threadpool;    
00055     for (size_t i(0); i<4; ++i)
00056       threadpool.create_thread
00057         (boost::bind
00058          (&boost::asio::io_service::run,
00059           boost::ref(network::get_io_service())));
00060 
00061     threadpool.join_all();
00062   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00063     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00064     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00065     return 1;
00066   }
00067   return 0;
00068 }
